.Sandra Appiah (amuru March 30, 1989) bu onye nchoputa ulo oru mgbasa ozi Face2face Africa, ebe o jere ozi dika onye isi ala site na 2016 rue 2020

With Face2face Africa dika ya.Akara flagship, PanaGenius na-erute ihe karịrị nde ndị ọrụ 2 kwa ọnwa site na ikpo okwu dị n'ịntanetị ma na-etinye puku kwuru puku ndị ọzọ site na mmemme dịka Mgbakọ izu ụka Pan-Africa na New York City.na mba 30Black Stars Conference and Awards

A mụrụ Appiah n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Ghana n'otu obere obodo na 1989, ọ kwagara Ịtali mgbe ọ dị afọ 8, ma biri na Milan. Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ezinụlọ ya kwagara New York City ọzọ. Appiah gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Bronx, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-ekwu okwu ikpeazụ ma nata agụmakwụkwọ na S

Newhouse School of Public Communications na Mahadum Syracuse.  Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na telivishọn, redio, na ihe nkiri na obere na ime ihe nkiri, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ magna cum laude, nke New York Times College Scholarship na Jonathan Levin (Time Warner) Scholarship kwadoro. Ọ nwetara ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na nkwenkwe na-ezighi ezi banyere ndị Afrịka nọ n'Ịtali na US, site n'aka ndị Afrịka-Amerịka nakwa site na agbụrụ ndị ọzọ. N'ihi ya, ihere mere ya maka ihe nketa ya, ruo mgbe ọ laghachiri Ghana n'afọ nke abụọ ya na mahadum.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Appiah rụrụ ọrụ na The New York Times, HBO, na MTV. Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke ọtụtụ ihe nrite
N'afọ 2011, Appiah na onye mmekọ ya bụ Isaac O

Babu-Boateng malitere Face2Face Africa, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi pan-Africa. Site na ahụmịhe ha na-etolite dị ka ndị Afrịka kwagara na United States, ha abụọ mepụtara ikpo okwu n'ịntanetị na magazin e biri ebi iji nyere aka gbanwee onyinyo Afrịka n'ime obodo ụwa. Appiah na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin Face2face Africa. N'afọ 2020, ha malitere PanaGenius Inc, nke ga-eje ozi dị ka ụlọ ọrụ nne na nna na Face2face Africa na nyiwe dijitalụ ndị ọzọ.

Appiah akwadola ihe ngosi okwu ịntanetị, ịgba ajụjụ ọnụ n'etiti ndị ọzọ Jesse, Alex Well, Femi Kuti, Serge Ibaka na Lira O kwuwo okwu na ogbako na ogbako n'Afrika, ikenye ụmụ nwanyị na ihe ndị ọzọ metụtara mmekọrịta ọha na eze.
